answers.answer: I have not had it but surprised they haven't tested you for it yet. My first was 9 lbs so they automatically tested me about 12 weeks to be sure I didn't have it this time around. I feel like they should have tested ya! Hope ya get some answers!
I have it currently. Was tested at 12 weeks. Right now it is controlled with blood sugars checks 4x a day and a new diet plan. My heart also feels like it is racing. Just ask the doctor.
How far along r u..I'm 18 weeks and I don't test for that intell the end of this month. Maybe call and mention it they may get you in to test u sooner.

im a lil over 17 weeks, with my other son i was tested from the beginning, although i have switched providers so i think thats whats taking so long. ive been feeling like this for the pasf week n a half and its awful. my last pregnancy i wouldn't control with diet or pills so they out me on high insulin. i lost alot of weight with my son when i was diagnosed. im praying this isnt the case but how im feeling right now it doesnt look good
Usually if you've had it with a previous pregnancy, more than likely you'll get it again with subsequent pregnancies.
What is this exactly and what do you do for it?  Iam very over weight at 20 weeks and my dr ordered a test.

its where they test you for your sugar levels. you drink a sugary drink wait an hour and they draw blood after that to see if you have gestational diabetes. if you are borderline or it shows high they will order another one but its a.3 hour test drink a sugar drink and evry hr after that up to 3 hrs they draw blood. if positive dr will.discuss if you can maintain your sugars with diet and exercise than you dnt need meds if not able to they will oder meds like pill for you to see if you maintain if not dr will tjen prescribe insulin which is no fun to maintain your sugars. i was on insulin and i hate it. i had to checks my sugars every 3 hours an  2 hours.after.I've eaten a meal amd give myself insulin 2 a day. no fun. but its all worth it at the endhope evrything is ok

its where they test you for your sugar levels. you drink a sugary drink wait an hour and they draw blood after that to see if you have gestational diabetes. if you are borderline or it shows high they will order another one but its a.3 hour test drink a sugar drink and evry hr after that up to 3 hrs they draw blood. if positive dr will.discuss if you can maintain your sugars with diet and exercise than you dnt need meds if not able to they will oder meds like pill for you to see if you maintain if not dr will tjen prescribe insulin which is no fun to maintain your sugars. i was on insulin and i hate it. i had to checks my sugars every 3 hours an  2 hours.after.I've eaten a meal amd give myself insulin 2 a day. no fun. but its all worth it at the endhope evrything is ok

question: i had it with my last son and with this pregnancy havent been tested but i possibly think i might have it again. not sure but after i eat maybe about an hour later my hearts starts racing i feel really dizzy my head hurts and my vision gets a lil blurred . has anyone had gestational diabetes or at least going through the same thing. please need help. see doctor Friday
title: gestational diabetes
